name: Hope for the Children Foundation

address: Mamta Society Lane No.3, Near Stella Maris School, Wadgaonsheri

briefDescription: Who we are?  Hope for the Children Foundation (HFCF), is a non-profit organization established in May 2006 and registered under the Charity commissioner of Pune.Our vision is to “educate and empower the society towards a sustainable transformation” and aim to bring about a social change where there are equal rights and opportunities for all.With over a decade-long presence in the community, HFCF utilizes its experience at the grassroots level and creates programs developed in-house that understand and respond to the needs of children vulnerable communities by contributing to their individual growth as well as the development of the community as a whole.
